amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the appropriation for the Office of the Secretary by $100,100.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. McHenry to the Gingrey amendment (A001).
